channel.title: Need help making my server!
channel.description: CAN ANYONE HELP ME BY MAKING ME A DECENT SERVER... CAUSE MY CPU WONT LET ME DOWNLOAD CERTAIN THINGS LIKE WIN RAR AND NO-IP... SO IF SOMEONE COULD JUST MAKE A SERVER WITH LIKE NOTHING ON IT.. AND GAVE ME SOME TIPS ABOUT CODING THAT WOULD BE GREAT. I'LL GIVE YOU ADMIN OR SOMETHIN =D PLZZZ HELP ME

item.title: Need help making my server!
item.dc:creator: @spineshadow spineshadow
item.description:
@spineshadow wrote:

Ok well this is a tut on how to make a server in 10 mins
for starters use silab

OK first of yall we need a no-ip

go to

no-ip.com once your there you need to registar a account
OK after you registar log in with your EMAIL and password then on the left side you see a button that says ADD
Click on it ok then you see a empty box type that you server log in you want it to be

like
sneakyscape.no-ip.biz or some thing like that

Ok once you have done that you need to download no-ip
Ok click on the Downloads tab (thats at the top right)
Ok once you have click that go down a little and click on

Windows and then once that loads click download
OK once you have downloaded that open it

Ok now we need a source

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Ok go there and download any source you like

  1. RUNNING server WITH OUT PORT FOWARDING

OK now we are going to run the server without doing all that port fowarding
http://download.utorrent.com/1.8/utorrent.exe

Ok once thats downloaded go to the top right and click Options
Once you have done that click prefences ok then you see a button that says
Random Port and then theres numbers next to it
you need to change those numbers to 43594

Ok then click ok

NOW YOUR DONE!!!

step 3. HOW TO GET INTO YOUR SERVER
ok ive been seeing tons of topics on how to get into your server
this is how

Ok First Open the no-ip then check your ip wait there there is a smiley face of 2 red things on his checks
once thats done click on Run Server in you source folder then go and open utorrent

THEN YOUR DONE hoped this helped!!!
100% by sneak22
